title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte, NC, are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies employed by businesses to maximize their presence and impact at local events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP of Business Development in Charlotte
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in the local financial sector, potentially creating new job opportunities.

title: Florence Airport Passenger Traffic Rises Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte, NC.
charlotte_impact: Shows the airport's resilience and potential for growth with possible new flights to Washington, D.C.

title: NC Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women in North Carolina are charged with the child abuse death of Dominique Moody, who was allegedly tortured in Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reports a tragic case of child abuse and raises concerns about child welfare in the community.

title: Homeowners Reassessing Sell Time as Market Shifts
summary: Homeowners are reassessing when to sell their homes as market conditions shift.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and is expanding economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates economic growth and investment in small businesses within the Charlotte region.

title: Iredell Sheriff Introduces New Narcotics Detection K-9
summary: The Iredell County Sheriff's Office introduces K-9 Waldo, trained to detect narcotics, find missing people, and locate evidence.
charlotte_impact: Enhances law enforcement capabilities in combating drug-related crimes and assisting in search operations.

title: CMPD Trains New Explosives Detection K-9
summary: The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police Department (CMPD) trains Keis, a black Dutch Shepherd, for explosives detection.
charlotte_impact: Strengthens public safety measures by improving the ability to detect and prevent potential explosive threats.

title: Lancaster Trio Sentenced for Medicaid Fraud Scheme
summary: Three individuals face federal prison for stealing nearly $250,000 from Medicaid through fraudulent billing and unlicensed therapists.
charlotte_impact: Highlights efforts to combat healthcare fraud and protect public funds intended for vulnerable populations.

title: NC Senator Pushes for State Budget After Trump Comments
summary: North Carolina is the only state without a budget. Officials push for state budget after Trump comments on Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the ongoing budget challenges in North Carolina and the impact on local communities.

title: Windy Wednesday; Rainy Thursday
summary: Weather forecast predicts a windy Wednesday followed by a rainy Thursday.

title: Avelo Airlines Extends Flight Schedule Through Fall

title: CATS Expands Ways for Riders to Report Safety Concerns
summary: Charlotte Area Transit System (CATS) expands reporting options for riders, adding a Text-a-Tip line and online reporting.
charlotte_impact: Improves safety and security for public transportation users by providing more accessible reporting channels.

title: Rabid Raccoon Found in Caldwell County
summary: A raccoon tests positive for rabies in Caldwell County, discovered in a horse pasture.

title: Mooresville Woman Wins $1 Million Powerball Prize
